comments:
If I use the C/C++ perspective and open a binary and open it, and then I select
a funcction that is part of the system libs(_init), and right click, and select
Add/Remove breakpoint it will successfull add the breakpoint. If I switch to the
debug perspective and double click on the breakpoint I will get an internal error.

Fixed. 
The right solution is to enable/disable the 'Go To File' action of the 
Breakpoints view. But this action is a part of the Eclipse Debug framework and 
I don't have access to it.
